name: Mangarock - Dark n Simple
description:
Turns the bright white colour pallet to a nice Dark. Making easier on the eyes.
Also hides ads.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: V1.2 (July 23rd, 2018) ► Fixed theme. V1.1 (June 25th, 2018): ► Fixed popup modals while reading. ► Removed most "Please disable adblocker" notices. └ If you want to get rid of all ads disable adblocker. It will also help support Mangarock. V1.0 (June 24th, 2018): ► First release.
